meta.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about booking, amenities, check-in, and policies at Loftly Apartment GmbH.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about your stay with us

q1.question: How do I book an apartment?
q1.answer: You can book directly through our website. Select your dates, choose your apartment, and complete the secure checkout process. You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details.

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and bank transfers through our secure Stripe payment system. All transactions are encrypted and secure.

q3.question: Can I modify or cancel my booking?
q3.answer: Yes, please refer to our cancellation policy. Modifications are subject to availability. Contact us as soon as possible if you need to make changes.

q4.question: Is there a minimum stay requirement?
q4.answer: Yes, we require a minimum stay of 3 nights for our apartments. For longer stays, we offer attractive discounts.

q1.question: What amenities are included?
q1.answer: All apartments include high-speed WiFi, fully equipped kitchen, washing machine, smart TV, bed linens, and towels. Each property may have additional amenities listed on its detail page.

q2.question: Are the apartments pet-friendly?
q2.answer: Our Hindenburgdamm apartment is pet-friendly with a €20 cleaning fee. Please inform us in advance if you're bringing a pet. The Kantstrasse apartment does not allow pets.

q3.question: Is parking available?
q3.answer: Free street parking is available near the Kantstrasse apartment. The Hindenburgdamm apartment has excellent public transport connections and street parking options.

q1.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
q1.answer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM to 11:00 PM. Check-out is at 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request, subject to availability.

q2.question: How do I access the apartment?
q2.answer: We use smart locks and lockboxes for self-check-in. You'll receive detailed instructions with access codes 24 hours before your arrival.

q3.question: What if I arrive late?
q3.answer: Self-check-in allows flexible arrival times. You'll have access to detailed instructions for 24/7 entry. If you have any issues, our emergency support line is available.

q1.question: Who do I contact if I have issues?
q1.answer: Contact us via phone (+49 163 3595589) or email (info@loftlyapartment.de). We provide 24/7 support for emergencies.

q2.question: Is housekeeping included?
q2.answer: For stays longer than 7 days, we provide complimentary mid-stay cleaning. Additional cleaning services can be arranged for a fee.

q3.question: Can I receive mail or packages?
q3.answer: Yes, we can arrange package delivery with advance notice. Please contact us with the delivery details before your stay.

q1.question: How do I get from the airport?
q1.answer: Both apartments are accessible via S-Bahn and U-Bahn from Berlin airports. Detailed directions will be provided in your confirmation email. Taxi or rideshare services are also available.

q2.question: What's nearby?
q2.answer: Both locations offer restaurants, supermarkets, cafes, and excellent transport connections within walking distance. Each property page includes detailed neighborhood information.

q1.question: What is your cancellation policy?
q1.answer: Free cancellation up to 14 days before check-in. Cancellations within 14 days are subject to a fee. See our full terms and conditions for details.

q2.question: Do you charge a security deposit?
q2.answer: Yes, a refundable security deposit of €300 is required. It will be returned within 7 days after checkout if there are no damages or issues.

q3.question: Are guests allowed to smoke?
q3.answer: No, all our apartments are strictly non-smoking. Smoking is not permitted inside the apartments or on balconies. Violations will result in forfeiture of the security deposit.

banner.title: Cookie Settings
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled in our systems. They are usually set in response to actions made by you, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling in forms.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and settings. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us understand which pages are most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites. Note: We currently do not use marketing cookies.
